name: flagsmith-es
description: Feature flagging to support continuous development. This is an esm equivalent of the standard flagsmith npm module.

scripts.postinstall:
echo '[31m[1mimportant: flagsmith-es is deprecated[0m

please install the official flagsmith package instead:

  [32m[1mnpm install flagsmith[0m

for more details, visit: https://github.com/Flagsmith/flagsmith-js-client
'

author: Flagsmith Ltd
